pages.text: Skip to content Events Mount Pleasant DAILY SPECIALS Summerville DAILY SPECIALS VIEW MENUS SWEATER BRUNCH UGLY 14 December 10AM – 3PM Get ready for the coziest brunch of the season! Join us on at Five Loaves Cafe. Throw on your brightest, funniest, or most fabulously over-the-top holiday attire and enjoy seasonal brunch specials + a hot cocoa station that’s sure to warm your spirits. December 14 for the Ugly Sweater Brunch Summerville and Mount Pleasant locations Entrée Deal Free Tuesdays in November from 5 PM – 9 PM Receive a with the purchase of any appetizer and drink when you dine in with us and pay on the Blackbird app. FREE ENTRÉE (Summerville location only) Card Deal Holiday Gift Now through December 24 When you purchase $50 worth of gift cards in-store, you’ll receive $10 in Bonus Bucks to use in the New Year. Bonus Bucks are redeemable 1/1/26–3/1/26. Gift cards are valid at all Five Loaves Café and Sesame Burgers and Beer locations. Dinner Celebration New Year's Eve December 31st 5-9pm Celebrate New Year’s Eve with Five Loaves Cafe by joining us for a special dinner for two! No reservations- walk in dining only. Deal valid at both Mt Pleasant and Summerville locations. With this special menu for $80/couple, you choose one appetizer, two entrees and one dessert. Plus a glass of champagne each included in this special dinner offering to close out 2025! Five Loaves Mount Pleasant NYE Menu Appetizers Sweet potato gnocchi/ pecans/ cranberries/ arugula/ brown butter (Vegetarian) Focaccia toast points/ burrata/ arugula and herb salad (Vegetarian) Entrees Duck confit/ Carolina gold rice/ butter beans/ collard greens/ pickled red onions CAB sirloin/ truffled mashed potatoes/ broccolini/ red wine demi glace (GF) Butternut squash ravioli/ beets/ caramelized onions/ cauliflower/ cranberries/ sage cream (Vegetarian) Desserts Lemon thyme panna cotta/ almond brittle/ blackberry compote/ candied lemon (GF & Vegetarian) Spiced banana bread/ sea salt caramel/ candied walnuts (Vegetarian) Five Loaves Summerville NYE Menu Appetizers Hatch chilli whipped pimento cheese/ Ritz crackers/ pickled celery sticks (Vegetarian) Braised leek and crab bisque/ Smoked bacon bread crumbs (GF) Entrees CAB sirloin/ Truffle parm roasted fingerling potatoes/ Sauteed Swiss chard Herb compound butter (GF) Mushroom bolognese lasagna/ Spinach/ herb ricotta/ mozzarella Homemade Rio Bertolini's handcrafted lasagna noodles (Vegetarian) Desserts Pistachio cheesecake/ White chocolate ganache (Vegetarian) Smores Creme brûlée/ Hersheys chocolate/ graham crackers/ Marshmallows (GF, Vegetarian) Week Restaurant Restaurant Week is January 8-18, and we’re celebrating with a 3-course dinner for just $40 at Five Loaves Cafe! Join us at either our Mount Pleasant and Summerville location and enjoy our 3-course dinner offering! Choose one appetizer, one entree, and one dessert. MENU Appetizers Chermoula Roasted Carrots/ Whipped Feta/ Toast Almonds-GF & Vegetarian Chipotle Braised Chicken/ Cornmeal Cake/ Avocado Puree/ Pico de Gallo Entrees Grilled Cheese and Tomato Soup/ Smoked Gouda/ Roasted Garlic Aioli/ Sourdough Bread/ Tomato Tarragon Soup-Vegetarian, can be GF with GF Bread Shrimp and Grits/ Blackened Shrimp/ Sweet Pepper/ Caramelized Onions/ Roasted Garlic/ Smoked Tomato Parmesan Sauce-GF Desserts Classic Cheesecake/ Honey Vanilla Sauce/ Candied Walnuts/ Whipped Cream Raspberry Almond Shortbread-GF Chocolate Panna Cotta/ Peppered Strawberries-GF Events Weekly Food & Bev Industry Night- Those F&B n the industry enjoy half price appetizers and entrees when you dine in with us on Monday evenings. Must show proof of paystub. Monday: – Enjoy all bottles of wine at 1/2 price. Wednesday & Saturday: Wine Night Happy Hour (Summerville location only) 3-5pm – Enjoy discounted wine, cocktails, and small plates. Monday-Friday: #THEGIFTOFGLOWFISCH GIFT CARDS BUY A GIFT CARD EXPLORE GLOWFISCH CONTACT US GIFT CARDS

Skip to content Celebrate summer with dishes from Five Loaves Cafe’s new seasonal menu This cafe has been a Charleston staple for 20+ years, offering gourmet sandwiches, salads, soups, and creative, daily-rotating specials. From soups and shareables to entrees, you don’t want to miss these summer specials at Five Loaves Cafe. Photo provided by Five Loaves Cafe Looking to try something new for dinner? Channel summer vibes with dinner on the patio at Five Loaves Cafe featuring their new menu and rotating specials. Read More CONTACT US GIFT CARDS

From soups and shareables to entrees, Read More 30+ great brunch restaurants to try in Charleston In this town, brunchin’ ain’t easy — but it’s necessary. Whether you’re on the hunt for fluffy eggs, chicken and waffles, or mind-blowing bloody marys, the options can get as overwhelming as the lines.
